page.title: 16EDUCATION
page.content: The area contains many primary and comprehensive schools. In Bramcote there is an interesting combination of a primary school, a special school, two comprehensive schools and a sixth form centre sited in pleasant surroundings on one large campus. Bramcote Hills primary school, opened in 1960, has just over 300 pupils. Foxwood school for the educationally sub-normal is a special school for slow learners aged up to sixteen. Bramcote Hills and Bramcote Park comprehensive schools have pupils aged between eleven and sixteen. Parkview sixth form centre provides post sixteen education for students from the comprehensives. All the schools make use of adjoining playing fields and of the leisure centre with its swimming pool and squash courts.
